title: Forza Horizon 4: Ultimate Edition – v1.465.282.0 Steam + All DLCs + Multiplayer
body:
Forza Horizon 4: Ultimate Edition – v1.465.282.0 Steam + All DLCs + Multiplayer


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Racing, Open world, 3D
Companies: Playground Games, Microsoft Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI17
Original Size: 96.8 GB
Repack Size: from 45.3 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Forza_Horizon_4-HOODLUM ISO release: hlm-forza_horizon_4.iso (96,219,049,984 bytes)
  • Game version is v1.465.282.0 Steam; 61 DLCs and expansions are included and activated
  • Unlike previous UWP-based versions of the game, this repack works fine on any Windows 10 build
  • Steam Online Fix by 0xdeadc0de is available in NoDVD folder after installation, allowing multiplayer support via Steam (use fake Steam/Microsoft accounts for that)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading of either 1080p or 4K videos, multiplayer intro video and voicepacks you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 89.6 to 45.3~52.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~35 minutes on 16-threads CPU; ~1 hour on 8-threads CPU; ~2 hours on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 96.8 GB
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • The game language is selected automatically based on your OS settings
  • Windows 10 LTSC builds need Microsoft Store/Xbox apps to be installed for game to work

Game Description

Dynamic seasons change everything at the world’s greatest automotive festival. Go it alone or team up with others to explore beautiful and historic Britain in a shared open world. Collect, modify and drive over 450 cars. Race, stunt, create and explore – choose your own path to become a Horizon Superstar.

You can skip downloading of either 1080p or 4K videos, multiplayer intro video and voicepacks you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files. You MUST download at least one of speech packs

  • fg-selective-english.bin + fg-selective-english-2.bin (MUST be downloaded and installed for all languages w/o their own voiceovers)
  • fg-selective-french.bin + fg-selective-french-2.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin + fg-selective-german-2.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin + fg-selective-spanish-2.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin + fg-selective-brazilian-2.bin
  • fg-optional-mp-video.bin (just an intro video for MP mode, not playable in cracked version)
  • fg-selective-videos-1080p.bin + fg-selective-videos-1080p-2.bin (game videos on 1920×1080 resolution)
  • fg-selective-videos-4K.bin + fg-selective-videos-4K-2.bin (game videos on 3840×2160 resolution)

In example, if you want to launch the game with Spanish voiceovers and 1080p videos – skip all “selective” and “optional” files, but download fg-selective-spanish.bin, fg-selective-spanish-2.bin, fg-selective-videos-1080p.bin, fg-selective-videos-1080p-2.bin & all main (01-17) files.

This repack is partially backwards compatible with my previous FH4 repack. You can rehash the following files and save up to 21.9 GB of traffic.

  • fg-02.bin
  • fg-04.bin
  • fg-06.bin
  • fg-11.bin
  • fg-15.bin
  • fg-optional-mp-video.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-english.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin
  • fg-selective-videos-4K.bin
  • fg-selective-videos-1080p.bin
